p: Four completely clean and sterile teeth were placed in BHI broth medium containing all isolated oral bacteria for one month, to form biofilm on the tooth. Then, to investigate the removal of biofilm formed on the teeth by plant mixture, the teeth were respectively exposed to the herbal mixture for 15, 35 and 45 sec (to determine the best time for biofilm removal), then the teeth were put in 0.1% crystal violet for 1 min, washed with distilled water and finally exposed for 95 sec to 95% ethanol to rinse the added color.
